data.text:
――Haaa, haaa, haa……!! 
Aww man, I ran out of energy part way again……!
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>――Haaa, haaa, haa……!! 
<story>Aww man, I ran out of energy part way again……!

data.text:
Even though I've been doing so much stamina training…… 
no, this isn't the time to be complaining! The 『Oaks』 
is soon so I need to work hard……!
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>Even though I've been doing so much stamina training…… 
<story>no, this isn't the time to be complaining! The 『Oaks』 
<story>is soon so I need to work hard……!

data.text:
Hey. ……You already realized it, right? 
About Kraft-san.
data.name: King Halo
data.processed:
<story>Hey. ……You already realized it, right? 
<story>About Kraft-san.

data.text:
(I already knew. The longer the distance, the harder it would 
be for Kraft. The 『Oaks』, at 2400m……would be very difficult)
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>(I already knew. The longer the distance, the harder it would 
<story>be for Kraft. The 『Oaks』, at 2400m……would be very difficult)

data.text:
(Based on that, I believed the best option for Kraft…… 
would be to offer her another option……)
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>(Based on that, I believed the best option for Kraft…… 
<story>would be to offer her another option……)

data.text:
……I really admire them. 
My senpais on the Triple Tiara route.
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>……I really admire them. 
<story>My senpais on the Triple Tiara route.

data.text:
And that's why I'm choosing the Triple Tiara 
rotation. And, I'll become strong enough that 
I won't lose against Triple Crown Uma Musume!
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>And that's why I'm choosing the Triple Tiara 
<story>rotation. And, I'll become strong enough that 
<story>I won't lose against Triple Crown Uma Musume!

data.text:
(Admiration can be the driving force behind 
chasing your dream. Without that, it would be 
like taking away your entire reason for running)
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>(Admiration can be the driving force behind 
<story>chasing your dream. Without that, it would be 
<story>like taking away your entire reason for running)

data.text:
(Considering how much Kraft admired the Tiara……it might 
be too much to ask her to give up on the 『Oaks』――)
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>(Considering how much Kraft admired the Tiara……it might 
<story>be too much to ask her to give up on the 『Oaks』――)

data.text:
As you continue to run, sometimes the shape 
of your dreams will change……or perhaps there's 
no choice other than for it to change.
data.name: King Halo
data.processed:
<story>As you continue to run, sometimes the shape 
<story>of your dreams will change……or perhaps there's 
<story>no choice other than for it to change.

data.text:
However, they never disappear. 
If you never give up, never let go――that's for certain.
data.name: King Halo
data.processed:
<story>However, they never disappear. 
<story>If you never give up, never let go――that's for certain.

data.text:
Aren't you the one that understands that the most? 
……since you've been walking this path with me this whole time.
data.name: King Halo
data.processed:
<story>Aren't you the one that understands that the most? 
<story>……since you've been walking this path with me this whole time.

data.text:
Right……think. Don't just dismiss it out of hand, keep 
thinking it through. What can I do for Kraft right now……?
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Right……think. Don't just dismiss it out of hand, keep 
<story>thinking it through. What can I do for Kraft right now……?

data.text:
Right……think. Don't just dismiss it out of hand, keep 
thinking it through. What can I do for Kraft right now……?
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Right……think. Don't just dismiss it out of hand, keep 
<story>thinking it through. What can I do for Kraft right now……?

data.text:
(Kraft is……a girl that admires the Tiara Uma 
Musume more than anything. Then, who would 
know best what to say to Kraft right now――)
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>(Kraft is……a girl that admires the Tiara Uma 
<story>Musume more than anything. Then, who would 
<story>know best what to say to Kraft right now――)

data.text:
『"The Unparalleled Queens"――Tonight, we'll be speaking about 
the magnificent tales of the top Senior Class Queen Uma Musume』
data.name: Telecaster
data.processed:
<story>『"The Unparalleled Queens"――Tonight, we'll be speaking about 
<story>the magnificent tales of the top Senior Class Queen Uma Musume』

data.text:
Several Queen Uma Musume who had etched their 
names in to history were shown on screen.
data.processed:
<story>Several Queen Uma Musume who had etched their 
<story>names in to history were shown on screen.

data.text:
――It could be said that it was 『Overturning』 expectations. 
The revival of a dynasty by my Grandmother, and my mother 
who won two tiaras. As one descended from their blood――
data.name: Daiichi Ruby
data.processed:
<story>――It could be said that it was 『Overturning』 expectations. 
<story>The revival of a dynasty by my Grandmother, and my mother 
<story>who won two tiaras. As one descended from their blood――

data.text:
As the successor to a "Renowned Family" who had 
many expectations to achieve the Triple Tiara. 
That I was unable to accomplish it is reality.
data.name: Daiichi Ruby
data.processed:
<story>As the successor to a "Renowned Family" who had 
<story>many expectations to achieve the Triple Tiara. 
<story>That I was unable to accomplish it is reality.

data.text:
Being unable to participate in the 『Oka Sho』, and a late start 
during the 『Oaks』. Being forced to recuperate during the autumn.
data.name: Daiichi Ruby
data.processed:
<story>Being unable to participate in the 『Oka Sho』, and a late start 
<story>during the 『Oaks』. Being forced to recuperate during the autumn.

data.text: ……On top of that, my aptitude lying in short distances.
data.name: Daiichi Ruby
data.processed: <story>……On top of that, my aptitude lying in short distances.

data.text:
As you're aware, compared to the royal road that is medium 
distances, there is much less attention. There were a great 
number of voices of disappointment when switching. However――
data.name: Daiichi Ruby
data.processed:
<story>As you're aware, compared to the royal road that is medium 
<story>distances, there is much less attention. There were a great 
<story>number of voices of disappointment when switching. However――

data.text:
What I recieved from my mother and my grandmother, 
was this 『Speed』. In that world where we compete for 
those instants, short distance, I ran to prove myself.
data.name: Daiichi Ruby
data.processed:
<story>What I recieved from my mother and my grandmother, 
<story>was this 『Speed』. In that world where we compete for 
<story>those instants, short distance, I ran to prove myself.

data.text:
That this path――is my duty, that this 
place is where my passion can shine.
data.name: Daiichi Ruby
data.processed:
<story>That this path――is my duty, that this 
<story>place is where my passion can shine.

data.text:
Daiichi Ruby. Winning the 『Yasuda Kinen』 and 
『Sprinter's S』, an Uma Musume that proved the 
strength of her bloodline through her 『Speed』.
data.processed:
<story>Daiichi Ruby. Winning the 『Yasuda Kinen』 and 
<story>『Sprinter's S』, an Uma Musume that proved the 
<story>strength of her bloodline through her 『Speed』.

data.text:
――I don't believe I possess any outstanding qualities or talent. 
Unlike everyone else here, I never achieved victory in a G1.
data.name: Ikuno Dictus
data.processed:
<story>――I don't believe I possess any outstanding qualities or talent. 
<story>Unlike everyone else here, I never achieved victory in a G1.

data.text:
However, if it's something that I take pride in, 
then I do have that. My strength was achieved through 
the information gained from those around me.
data.name: Ikuno Dictus
data.processed:
<story>However, if it's something that I take pride in, 
<story>then I do have that. My strength was achieved through 
<story>the information gained from those around me.

data.text:
My 『Intel Skills』 are what I take pride in, my weapon. 
In the racing world, filled with such strong individuals, 
to truly shine――this is my weapon.
data.name: Ikuno Dictus
data.processed:
<story>My 『Intel Skills』 are what I take pride in, my weapon. 
<story>In the racing world, filled with such strong individuals, 
<story>to truly shine――this is my weapon.

data.text:
To go just a bit farther. For one more battle. 
And――to obtain just one more bit of glory.
data.name: Ikuno Dictus
data.processed:
<story>To go just a bit farther. For one more battle. 
<story>And――to obtain just one more bit of glory.

data.text:
With this weapon, my 『Intel Skills』, I will accomplish that. 
……I am proud to do this on my own will.
data.name: Ikuno Dictus
data.processed:
<story>With this weapon, my 『Intel Skills』, I will accomplish that. 
<story>……I am proud to do this on my own will.

data.text:
Ikuno Dictus. In the Twinkle Series, 
competing in 51 races without injury――
data.processed:
<story>Ikuno Dictus. In the Twinkle Series, 
<story>competing in 51 races without injury――

data.text:
With a grueling 3-week rotation of the 『Yasuda Kinen』 
and 『Takarazuka Kinen』. An Uma Musume with a body and 
mind of steel who still managed to achieve 2nd place in both.
data.processed:
<story>With a grueling 3-week rotation of the 『Yasuda Kinen』 
<story>and 『Takarazuka Kinen』. An Uma Musume with a body and 
<story>mind of steel who still managed to achieve 2nd place in both.

data.text:
――Getting a flashy title like 『Unparalleled Queen』, huh? 
Honestly, I never thought of anything complicated like that!
data.name: Hishi Amazon
data.processed:
<story>――Getting a flashy title like 『Unparalleled Queen』, huh? 
<story>Honestly, I never thought of anything complicated like that!

data.text: The only thing I seek is to compete against the strong! That's all!
data.name: Hishi Amazon
data.processed: <story>The only thing I seek is to compete against the strong! That's all!

data.text:
A lukewarm battle, does nothing to fire up my soul. For this body, 
for this heart, it can't be anything but a fierce race!
data.name: Hishi Amazon
data.processed:
<story>A lukewarm battle, does nothing to fire up my soul. For this body, 
<story>for this heart, it can't be anything but a fierce race!

data.text:
Something that pushes me closer and closer 
to my limits――no, a race that forces me past 
my limits, that's when I become the strongest.
data.name: Hishi Amazon
data.processed:
<story>Something that pushes me closer and closer 
<story>to my limits――no, a race that forces me past 
<story>my limits, that's when I become the strongest.

data.text:
Sometimes I'd get asked if I've ever felt 
intimidated, you know? But never, not once. 
Rather, it's so fun I can't help but get excited!
data.name: Hishi Amazon
data.processed:
<story>Sometimes I'd get asked if I've ever felt 
<story>intimidated, you know? But never, not once. 
<story>Rather, it's so fun I can't help but get excited!

data.text:
It was like that when I faced off against that "Monster" too! 
I'm the strongest when I'm fighting it out!!
data.name: Hishi Amazon
data.processed:
<story>It was like that when I faced off against that "Monster" too! 
<story>I'm the strongest when I'm fighting it out!!

data.text:
Hishi Amazon. Although she wasn't able to participate in 
the Oka Sho or Oaks, she had won 5 consecutive major 
victories. Then she went on to win the Elizabeth Cup――
data.processed:
<story>Hishi Amazon. Although she wasn't able to participate in 
<story>the Oka Sho or Oaks, she had won 5 consecutive major 
<story>victories. Then she went on to win the Elizabeth Cup――

data.text:
Not only was she considered the queen of her generation, 
but with her strength, she was the only one to come even 
close to that "Monster", Narita Brian, at the 『Arima Kinen』.
data.processed:
<story>Not only was she considered the queen of her generation, 
<story>but with her strength, she was the only one to come even 
<story>close to that "Monster", Narita Brian, at the 『Arima Kinen』.

data.text:
――My mother once held the title of "Queen". From my first steps…… 
or maybe even before that, my path was already decided.
data.name: Air Groove
data.processed:
<story>――My mother once held the title of "Queen". From my first steps…… 
<story>or maybe even before that, my path was already decided.

data.text:
To become the brightest guiding light. To become the 『Ideal』 
for all Uma Musume, for all those who are just beginning.
data.name: Air Groove
data.processed:
<story>To become the brightest guiding light. To become the 『Ideal』 
<story>for all Uma Musume, for all those who are just beginning.

data.text:
That is my mission. 
To become that "Empress" is my reason for existence.
data.name: Air Groove
data.processed:
<story>That is my mission. 
<story>To become that "Empress" is my reason for existence.

data.text:
In which case, I have nothing to fear. No matter which battlefield―― 
whether it be the 『Tenno Sho (Autumn)』 or the 『Japan Cup』.
data.name: Air Groove
data.processed:
<story>In which case, I have nothing to fear. No matter which battlefield―― 
<story>whether it be the 『Tenno Sho (Autumn)』 or the 『Japan Cup』.

data.text:
I will move forth with dignity, putting all of my 
strength, all of my being, in to obtaining victory.
data.name: Air Groove
data.processed:
<story>I will move forth with dignity, putting all of my 
<story>strength, all of my being, in to obtaining victory.

data.text:
To continue taking on all those challenges will be the 
way to inspire all those that come after――I think that 
belief is what spurred me on to greater heights.
data.name: Air Groove
data.processed:
<story>To continue taking on all those challenges will be the 
<story>way to inspire all those that come after――I think that 
<story>belief is what spurred me on to greater heights.

data.text:
Air Groove. She became the first Uma Musume from the 
Tiara route to win the 『Tenno Sho (Autumn)』, becoming 
an inspiration for many famous Uma Musume after her.
data.processed:
<story>Air Groove. She became the first Uma Musume from the 
<story>Tiara route to win the 『Tenno Sho (Autumn)』, becoming 
<story>an inspiration for many famous Uma Musume after her.

data.text:
Staring at the screen, I racked my brain. Keep thinking. 
These amazing Uma Musume who carved their names in to 
history, what did they all have in common?
data.processed:
<story>Staring at the screen, I racked my brain. Keep thinking. 
<story>These amazing Uma Musume who carved their names in to 
<story>history, what did they all have in common?

data.text:
Each of them had their own dreams, goals, and missions, 
alongside a strong desire to pursue them.
data.processed:
<story>Each of them had their own dreams, goals, and missions, 
<story>alongside a strong desire to pursue them.

data.text:
Wondering where they could shine the brightest. 
Understanding their true strengths.
data.processed:
<story>Wondering where they could shine the brightest. 
<story>Understanding their true strengths.

data.text:
Thinking, worrying, choosing. 
And then――
data.processed:
<story>Thinking, worrying, choosing. 
<story>And then――

data.text:
(……deciding their own unique path for themselves. Something 
they could be proud of and achieving glory along the way)
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>(……deciding their own unique path for themselves. Something 
<story>they could be proud of and achieving glory along the way)

data.text:
Just like the Triple Crown Uma Musume, they built an 
era. Leaving a wide impact on many, even if they weren't 
considered the representatives of their generation.
data.processed:
<story>Just like the Triple Crown Uma Musume, they built an 
<story>era. Leaving a wide impact on many, even if they weren't 
<story>considered the representatives of their generation.

data.text:
But those Tiara Uma Musume still had an appeal 
all of their own. And――they had already shown 
us that. They had shown us and created that link.
data.processed:
<story>But those Tiara Uma Musume still had an appeal 
<story>all of their own. And――they had already shown 
<story>us that. They had shown us and created that link.

data.text:
(That's why……Rhein Kraft was here 
right now, why she was running.)
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>(That's why……Rhein Kraft was here 
<story>right now, why she was running.)

data.text:
The program had ended before I realized. I turned off the 
TV and took a deep breath. The room was completely silent, 
the only thing on my mind――was the cheering at the 『Oka Sho』.
data.processed:
<story>The program had ended before I realized. I turned off the 
<story>TV and took a deep breath. The room was completely silent, 
<story>the only thing on my mind――was the cheering at the 『Oka Sho』.

data.text:
I was now convinced. The place that Rhein Kraft 
could be the strongest, shine the brightest was――
data.processed:
<story>I was now convinced. The place that Rhein Kraft 
<story>could be the strongest, shine the brightest was――

data.text: (Knock knock……)
data.processed: <story>(Knock knock……)

data.text: Excuse me……Ah, Trainer-san!
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed: <story>Excuse me……Ah, Trainer-san!

data.text:
Good afternoon. Um, well then……by important 
conversation, what did you mean?
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>Good afternoon. Um, well then……by important 
<story>conversation, what did you mean?

data.text:
I tried not to sound too cold, but wanted to 
give my honest opinion. Due to her aptitudes, 
the 2400m Oaks would probably be incredibly difficult.
data.processed:
<story>I tried not to sound too cold, but wanted to 
<story>give my honest opinion. Due to her aptitudes, 
<story>the 2400m Oaks would probably be incredibly difficult.

data.text: Therefore, as a trainer――
data.processed: <story>Therefore, as a trainer――

data.text: Eh……eh? By different, you mean……?
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed: <story>Eh……eh? By different, you mean……?

data.text:
……your run at the 『Oka Sho』 was really amazing. 
When it comes to Mile races, I think you're the 
fastest of your generation……that's what I believe.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>……your run at the 『Oka Sho』 was really amazing. 
<story>When it comes to Mile races, I think you're the 
<story>fastest of your generation……that's what I believe.

data.text:
……your run at the 『Oka Sho』 was really amazing. 
When it comes to Mile races, I think you're the 
fastest of your generation……that's what I believe.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>……your run at the 『Oka Sho』 was really amazing. 
<story>When it comes to Mile races, I think you're the 
<story>fastest of your generation……that's what I believe.

data.text: That's why……Kraft.
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>That's why……Kraft.

data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed: <story>……!?

data.text:
Just give it some thought Kraft. And about your aspirations, 
your dreams, and what you've seen so far along your journey.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Just give it some thought Kraft. And about your aspirations, 
<story>your dreams, and what you've seen so far along your journey.

data.text:
Just give it some thought Kraft. And about your aspirations, 
your dreams, and what you've seen so far along your journey.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Just give it some thought Kraft. And about your aspirations, 
<story>your dreams, and what you've seen so far along your journey.

data.text:
And then…… 
about a path that only you can run.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>And then…… 
<story>about a path that only you can run.

data.text:
And then…… 
about a path that only you can run.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>And then…… 
<story>about a path that only you can run.
